import React,{useState}from'react';import Home from'./pages/Home';import{BrowserRouter,Routes,Route}from'react-router-dom';import SignUp from'./pages/SignUp/SignUp';import Cart from'./pages/Cart/Cart';import Delivery from'./pages/Location/Delivery';import Profile from'./pages/Profile/Profile';import OrderAccepted from'./pages/Order-accepted/Order-accepted';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function App(){// ✅ Bitta joyda umumiy savat holati
const[cartItems,setCartItems]=useState([]);// Savatni yangilash
const updateCartItems=items=>{setCartItems(items);};// ✅ Buyurtma tugagach savatni tozalash
const handleOrderAccepted=()=>{setCartItems([]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BrowserRouter,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Home,{cartItems:cartItems,updateCartItems:updateCartItems})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/signup",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SignUp,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/cart",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cart,{cartItems:cartItems,updateCartItems:updateCartItems})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/delivery",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Delivery,{cartItems:cartItems,updateCartItems:updateCartItems,onOrderAccepted:handleOrderAccepted})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/profile",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Profile,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/order-accepted",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OrderAccepted,{onClose:handleOrderAccepted})})]})});}
